public void onTransactionApproved(Transaction transaction)




Description copied from interface: TransactionListener


Approved handler for the execution of a transaction. At this stage the transaction is
 completely and successfully executed and approved.

onTransactionApproved in interface TransactionListener






Parameters:

 completely executed but was declined.

onTransactionAborted


public void onTransactionAborted(Transaction transaction)




Description copied from interface: TransactionListener


Aborted handler for the execution of a transaction. At this stage the shopper or merchant
 has aborted the transaction.





Specified by:
onTransactionAborted in interface TransactionListener






Parameters:
transaction - The aborted transaction.










onTransactionFailure


public void onTransactionFailure(Transaction transaction,
                                 MposError error)




Description copied from interface: TransactionListener


Failure handler for the execution of a transaction. There are different reasons why a
 transaction may fail: Network errors, missing parameters, invalid payment details). Some of
 those errors are recoverable (e.g. by just starting the transaction again). The error will
 provider information about the recoverability.





Specified by:
onTransactionFailure in interface TransactionListener






Parameters:
transaction - The failed transaction.
error - Indicates what happened and how to proceed










onTransactionActionRequired


public void onTransactionActionRequired(Transaction transaction,
                                        TransactionAction action,
                                        TransactionActionSupport supportData)




Description copied from interface: TransactionListener


Action handler for a transaction, used to request additional details when needed (e.g. some
 POS transaction needs a customer signature). To only get requests for actions that you
 support, provide a bit mask of actions when initializing the provider.





Specified by:
onTransactionActionRequired in interface TransactionListener






Parameters:
transaction - The transaction requesting the additional action/data
action - The requested action/data
supportData - Additional data that may be needed for certain types of actions (will
                    require a downcast)
